description:
Elliott is a fan who saw Thor's video. He contacted us, saying he would give anything to eat out Thor's ass.
Now Thor had never had his ass eaten out and when I presented him with the idea, he got a puzzled look on his face like "why would anyone want to do that?" (straight guys are so funny that way).
Well, after Elliott had his way with him, Thor found out why someone would want to do that. Thor wouldn't say it on camera (straight guys are also funny that way), but he confessed that he really liked it! In his words: it gave him "a warm tingling feeling."
title: Thor & Elliott
